original_title: Franklin and Friends Adventure: Polar Explorer
overview: When Franklin’s Great Aunt Harriet’s heirloom key opens a special Navigation Bar, the coordinates send Franklin and his parents on an adventure that will take them to the North and South Pole! With a husky Polar Bear Ranger as their host to the Arctic and the navigation bar as their map, the Turtle family embarks on a mysterious journey, leading them to many adventures and incredible sights.
title: Franklin and Friends Adventure: Polar Explorer
